segments.text: That was quick work . Let me have a look at it . Yeah , everything looks fine now . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much do I owe you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The total is 87 dollars . Here is the bill .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? You worked here for just half an hour . I consider the price very high .
segments.speaker: S2
